name: Americas Best Value Inn & Suites - San Francisco Airport

reviews.text: I enjoyed staying there during the whole week. Family, which run hotel was very nice, helpful.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable

reviews.text: Room had basic amenities, all useful and appreciated, specially fridge, microwave, coffeemaker. Bathroom had shower and bathtub, specious and updated. Room also was big enough for me to move around, with desk for laptop, cocktail table, sofa to sit and enjoy meal, company. Breakfast was basic to start the day,; hot/cold cereal, milk coffee/tea, danish and an apple.
reviews.title: Small and quiet

reviews.text: Bed for me was comfortable, I can't say it was hard as other guest mentioned.
reviews.title: Decent Room; Hard Bed

reviews.text: I had rental car, no problem with parking, or driving distance to downtown of San Francisco.
reviews.title: Americans best value inn san Francisco

reviews.text: Comparing to previous trip to SF, when I stayed in downtown of SF, with no car, I'd rather do the same, pay less and have comfortable room. My room was on side, away highway, noise from traffic didn't effected me and was useful to move around quickly. I'll gladly return to same place and recommend to others this hotel, who are on limited budget.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great Inn for traveler's flying via SF airport - park and fly. Rooms are stylish and open onto a beautifully appointed courtyard from the ground floor. The courtyard is open to the street, however, so not so safe feeling at night as hotel management (Mr. Patel?) closes lobby at 10 pm (we checked in late at 11 pm). Surrounding neighborhood appears to be working class and up-kept homes. The beds are firm, but pillows are flat and hard. Heating and air conditioning are the large unit that fits under the window and makes quite a bit of noise when running. Our room was next to vending machines in courtyard, so we got to hear soda cans being dispensed late into the night by either street passersby's or hotel guests. Parking garage is also open to street. Garage is both covered and uncovered. Hotel sits right alongside Hwy 101.
reviews.title: Very Clean & Cared For

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent nice and clean and a small hotel. Although the hotel is small but the rooms are really huge. Very specious and clean room. We paid $72 per one night during our visit to SFO last Feb. We are really happy with the service we got for the proce we pay. They also have complementary breakfast which I believe can be improved .
reviews.title: Excellent nice and clean hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We just stayed two nights here and we thought it was one of the nicest places we've stayed. It was very clean. spacious, and modern and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Lots of restaurants in walking distance and really close to the airport. I would stay here again!
reviews.title: Extremely nice staff and very clean and cute motel

reviews.text: We spent two days at this Hotel. We arrived at midnight and the owner was waiting for us. Even at this hour he was cheerful. We were up early the next morning and it was the owner again who met me when I came down to get something to eat. He was just as cheerful and he seemed genuinely happy that I was there. The rooms were clean and the neighborhood quiet. The next time I come to SF I will definitely stay here.
reviews.title: A pleasant stay
customers
reviews.text: my girlfriend and I have stayed in this hotel for a long while, after moving from different places. I like this place very much. Free parking, free coffee, the rooms are nice and clean, good service, nice friendly staff, low cost, and I would like to recommend this hotel to family and friends.
A friend and I stayed in a double room and were welcomed by a great modern room with good amenities. The bed was really comfortable with a nice spread. We looked forward to that bed after a long day!
reviews.title: Brilliant, great service and would recommend

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Cleanliness is important for me, and the room definitely met this requirement. I was particularly impressed by the family managing the hotel that was polite and very helpful, which was nice.
reviews.title: CLEAN AND NICE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My friend and I were really happy because there were pastries,cereals and hot drinks in the reception area, so we didn't have to worry about breakfast.
reviews.title: Most pleasant, convenient and relaxing destination for a jetlagged arrival!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location was also surprisingly good, because there's a regular bus that takes you into other areas of san fran and the hotel is a stone's throw away from SFO airport, so wasn't a hassle on the day we flew out.
reviews.title: Not bad at all - good value!

reviews.text: Definitely would recommend this place.
reviews.title: Best budget hotel by SFO!

reviews.text: This is by far the most lovingly kept, conscientiously managed property in the neighborhood. I can't say enough good about the staff that checks you in and the housekeeping. The hotel is a little haven of kindliness and cleanliness in South San Fran.
reviews.title: If you have to stay in this neighborhood...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Continental breakfast is tiny (as is the hotel), but rooms are perfect and you can't beat the parking - separate parking for upper and lower floors means your car is close to your room but without noisy traffic or a giant parking ramp.
reviews.title: Convenient to SFO
Good value near the airport
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here on our last night in California. The hotel was not much to look at from the outside, but had free indoor parking and a very courteous, professional front desk clerk. He was very helpful regarding restaurant recommendations. The room itself was clean and comfortable. It's less than a five minute drive to SFO so the location was just perfect as we had to return our rental car before our early flight. I would not hesitate to stay here again and recommend this hotel to family and friends.

We booked this hotel since we had an early flight out the next morning and had to drop off a rental car before the flight. The room was good value, clean and the bed comfortable. The manager was helpful with the operation of the TV and a restaurant recommendation within walking distance.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay, Good Value for San Fran!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After trawling trip advisor for San Fran accommodation and finding either poor reviews or super pricey, we found this gem! Good value, rooms were large, very clean, comfortable and quiet. No problems with anything. In South San Fran - 15 min drive into all the action. Lots of parking. Very basic breakfast but food in San Fran is awesome so no worries here. These guys are working really hard and it shows!
reviews.title: A great find!

aka: Americas Best Value Inn And Suites - San Francisco Airport
description: Welcome to Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Airport/South San Francisco. We are conveniently located off Highway 101, only three miles north from San Francisco International Airport and eight miles from downtown San Francisco. Our hotel is a short ride from Fisherman's Wharf, Cable Car Stations, Pier 39, Presidio, Fort Mason, Alcatraz, and the Golden Gate Bridge. Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Airport/South San Francisco features 23 newly renovated hotel rooms and suites with beautiful decor. Our hotel offers a free continental breakfast served daily from 7am to 10am. Our guest rooms feature free wireless high-speed Internet access, microwaves, mini-fridges, coffeemakers, cable TVs with HBO, hairdryers, irons, ironing boards, and free local calls. Free on-site parking is available. Our hotel is ideal for families, couples, and individual travelers. Whether you are traveling for business or pleasure, Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Airport/South San Francisco offers the perfect blend of bay area charm, luxury, and modern amenities. We understand that it is the little things that make your stay comfortable. At Americas Best Value Inn and Suites Airport/South San Francisco, We've Got You Covered from the time you hit the road until your head hits the pillow.
